K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:1b-1: a'arya aa tsa la n'a ma dh'a ra n'i /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:1b-2: bod skad du; 'phags pa mi g-yo ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:1b-3: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:2a-0: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na; bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum gyi khang bu brtsegs pa na @2a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:2a-2: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor 'dus pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:2a-3: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:2a-6: sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:2a-8: spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:2a-10: byams pa la sogs pa sa bcu pa 'ba' zhig dang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:2b-0: de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pa stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g-yas @2b pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:2b-2: 'dzam bu'i gling 'di na gnas pa'i lha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:2b-5: sha za ma rungs pa dag gis mi nad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:2b-9: dus ma yin pa'i 'chi ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:2b-12: dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:2b-14: sa g-yos pa la sogs pa byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:2b-15: de dag zhi bar mdzad du gsol zhes gsol pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:2b-16: bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar rnam par dag pa'i sgo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:3a-0: @3a *// sku'i ba spu'i khung bu nas 'od zer me lce rab tu 'bar ba byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:3a-3: gzugs med pa la thug pa me lce 'bar ba gcig tu gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:3a-4: de'i tshe nyi ma dang zla ba la sogs pa'i 'od kyang lham me dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:3a-7: lha rnams kyi 'od kyang lham me dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:3a-12: sha za la sogs pa rnams ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:3a-13: rlung drag pos bdas pa'i shing bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:3b-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi dbyings rnam par mi rtog pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag ste mnyam pa'i phyag rgya bshig nas zhabs kyi pus mo sa la brdabs @3b pas thugs kyi bdag nyid kyi brtan pa'i sku can gyi khro bo zhabs brkyang bskum du bzhugs pa dag byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:3b-1: thabs las byung ba'i khro ba'i sprul pa dpag tu med pa dang bcas nas nam mkha' ma lus pa 'od kyis 'gengs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:3b-2: 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dag na bzhugs pa tshangs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:3b-5: drag po chen po bzhi po dag ha h'um hri zhes bya bas skrag par byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:3b-12: sha za yi dvags la sogs pa h'am mam zhes brjod pas skrag par mdzad pa dag sprul to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:3b-13: gsung gi bdag nyid kyi brtan pa'i sku can zhabs phyed sa la pus mo dang mthe bong btsugs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:3b-14: zhabs gcig langs te pus mo btsugs pas bzhugs pa'i khro bo brtan pa'i sku can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:3b-15: shes rab kyi bdag nyid ral gri me 'od dang bcas pas 'od kyis 'gengs pa dag sprul to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:3b-16: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyis brlabs pa las byung ba'i khro bo dag gi spags smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:3b-18: aa tsa la ka na tsanda ma h'a ro sha na spho ta ya h'um badzra dhri ka khadga /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:3b-19: h'um mam h'um mam zhes brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:4a-0: lag pa g-yas pa khu tshur bcangs te srin lag dang mthe'u chung gnyis bsgrengs @4a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:4a-3: g-yas bskor du mtshams gcad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:4a-4: na ma: sa manta badzra n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:4a-5: aa tsa la ka na tsanda ma h'a ro sha na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:4a-7: aa mri ta h'um h'um zhes brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:4a-9: lag pa sor mo rnams brkyang ste mthe'u chung mthe bos mnan pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:4a-10: rdo rje rtse gsum pa'i phyag rgya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:4a-11: g-yas nas bskor la bgegs bskrad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:4a-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis srung ba gsungs pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:4a-13: dmar po'i yi ge ram spyi bor bsam ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:4a-14: rnam par dag pa'i yi ge 'dis brtan par byas nas rdo rje dang ral gris lus me 'od dang bcas par bsgom ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:4a-15: na ma: sa manta badzra n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:4a-16: aa tsa la ka na tsanda ma h'a ro sha na ka te bhya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:4a-19: sarba ta th'a ga ta h'am mam raksha zhes brjod de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:4a-21: rdo rje thal mo sbyar te mdzub mo gnyis gung mo'i rgyab tu sbyar te smin mtshams su bca' bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:4a-22: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub kyi sems rig pa chen po'i srung ba gsungs pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:4a-23: h'um dang gzhi'i rnam pas bltas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:4a-24: na ma: sa manta badzra n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:4a-25: aa tsa la ka na tsanda ma h'a ro sha na ka te bhya:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:4a-28: sarba th'a ga ta h'am mam/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:4b-0: @4b sarba ta th'a ga ta pra me ni rga rdza h'um h'um phat tra tha tra tha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:4b-1: aa pra ti ha te sv'a h'a zhes brjod de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:4b-3: rdo rje'i thal mo sbyar la mdzub mo gnyis nang du bkug la gung mo rtse sprad de srin lag gnyis brkyang nas mthe'u chung gnyis cung zhig bkug la snying gar bcas te srung ba ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:4b-7: ma rungs pa thams cad dran pa tsam gyis 'byer bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:4b-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te kha zas kyi bye brag bza' ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:4b-12: bldag pa la sogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:4b-16: ro'i bye brag la byin gyis brlab pa mdzad de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:4b-17: aom sarba dharma t'a si ta h'um zhes bya bas dag par byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:4b-18: aom aa mri ta aom h'um hr'i: zhes bya bas ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:4b-20: aom na ma: sarba ta th'a ga ta aa ba lo ki te sambha ra h'um zhes bya bas lan bdun bdun btab ste bsngos pas tshim par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:4b-23: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:4b-26: na mo ratna tr'a y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:4b-27: na ma: tsanda badzra p'a na ye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:4b-28: na mo badzra kro dh'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:4b-29: dam shto ta ka ta bhee ra w'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:5a-1: mu sa la pa ra shu p'a sh'a hasta ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:5a-3: aom aa mri ta kunda li /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:5a-9: gardza gardza; bi spho ta ya bi spho ta ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:5a-10: sarba bi ghnam bi n'a ya k'a n'am ma h'a ga na pa ti dz'i bi ta aanta ka ra na sv'a h'a zhes bya ba brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:5a-11: lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs la kha nang du bstan te mdzub mo bsgrengs la brang du bsnol la phyag rgya bcings te gtor ma btang zhing 'chag pa'i dus su yang de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:5a-12: nye reg bya ba dang khrus bya ba ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:5a-13: rin po che'i bum par dri zhim po'i chu la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:5a-14: na ma: sa manta badzr'a n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:5a-15: aa tsa la ka na ya aa mri ta zhes lan bdun bdun btab ste lag pa g-yon pas bum pa bzung nas g-yas pa'i gung mo dang srin lag cung zad tsam bkug la ri mo can gyi nang du aa bsam la chu blugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:5a-16: aom shudda dunte sho dha na ye sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:5a-18: de skad ces bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:5a-19: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' byams pa la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:5a-20: de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi 'khor dang bcas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:5a-21: sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:5a-25: gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyis me tog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:5b-3: bu mo dag rin po che'i rgyan dang bcas pas shing rta dpag tu med pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:5b-4: mchod pa'i yo byad dpag tu med pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:5b-5: bskor ba rgya chen po dag byas te byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang thabs cig tu 'dug go //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:5b-6: de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pa spro pa dang ldan pas bcom ldan 'das la blta'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:5b-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis byams pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas bsam gtan dang po la mnyam par bzhag ste 'dod pa'i bde ba spangs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:5b-8: dga' bar rtog pa tsam mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:5b-9: de nas bsam gtan dang po nas gnyis pa la mnyam par bzhag ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:5b-10: rtse gcig pa'i rtog dpyod spangs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:5b-12: bsam gtan gnyis pa nas gsum pa la mnyam par bzhag ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:5b-13: rtog pa dang dpyod pa spangs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:5b-15: de nas bsam gtan gsum pa nas bzhi pa la mnyam par bzhag ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:5b-16: tshor ba nye bar zhi ba'i bde ba tsam mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:5b-17: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:5b-18: ting nge 'dzin de dag dang ldan na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:5b-24: byang chub kyi sems kyi rgyud spel ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:6a-2: nam mkha' ltar mtha' bzhi las rnam par grol ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:6a-3: na ma: sa manta badzr'a n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:6a-4: dharma dh'a tu sva bh'a ba a'atma konyaham/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:6a-8: lag pa gnyis so sor khu tshur bcangs te mthe bong gnyis nang du bcug la mdzub mo gnyis bsgreng ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:6a-9: 'phags pa mi g-yo ba'i gzungs las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:6a-10: gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:6a-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:6a-12: rdo rje'i skyil mo krung bcas te snying gar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la thugs kyi sa bon gyi 'od kyis nam mkha' kun khengs par bsams te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:6a-13: sa bon de las chos thams cad tshig gi lam dang bral ba'o /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:6a-14: zhes bya ba'i sgra dang bcas pas 'phel ba dang 'grib pa'i sgra 'od zer 'phro 'du dang bcas pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:6a-15: de nas sna tshogs pa'i gdan 'dam nas skyes pa dri ma med cing yongs su rgyas par tshogs kyi bdag po'i steng du rta bdun pa kun nas 'od 'phro ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:6a-16: 'dam skyes dang ldan pa dag gi steng du nam mkha'i mdog can gyi thugs kyi sa bon dang bdag nyid gcig pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:6b-0: nam mkha'i khams kun tu khyab par 'od kyi sa 'gengs pa'i shes rab kyi ral gri sngon po dag tu gyur te de dag las bdud dang @6b ma rungs pa mtha' dag 'joms pa'i khro bo chen po rnam rtog thams cad yongs su bcom pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:6b-1: dri ma med cing gzhon nu'i sku'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:6b-2: de yang gzhon zhing sku'i sha rgyas pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:6b-3: dper na; bus pa gzhon nu lang tsho la bab pa'i lus lta bu ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:6b-7: dbyar gyi char sprin nag po'i mdog bzhin du gnas pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:6b-8: nam mkha' ma lus pa thams cad du 'od kyis 'gengs pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:6b-10: rta bdun pa'i 'od kyis gling kun tu khyab pa bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:6b-11: dbu skra gcig tu bcings shing 'phyar ba ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:6b-13: shing aa la ka'i 'bras bu bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:6b-17: dpag bsam gyi shing yongs 'du sa rtol bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:6b-18: zhabs brkyang bskum du bzhugs pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:6b-21: spyan gsum shin tu dmar ba ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:6b-23: pa la sha'i me tog bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:6b-24: spyan steng 'og tu blta ba ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:6b-25: steng 'og gi bgegs sreg pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:6b-27: lha ma yin gyi bya gtor ma za ba bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:6b-30: zla ba phyed pa bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:6b-32: dper na; nam mkha'i yog [?] bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:6b-33: smin ma khro gnyer du bsdus pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:6b-35: shing pa laksh'i lo ma bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:6b-36: phyag g-yas na ral gri bsnams pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:7a-1: chen po'i 'od ltung ba bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:7a-2: sprul gyi zhags pa g-yon na bsnams pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:7a-5: de lta bu'i sku des ni; tshangs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:7a-7: rgyal po'i chen po bzhi dag dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:7a-8: phyogs skyong ba la sogs pa brnams dbang du sdud pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:7a-14: lto 'phye la sogs pa 'joms par byed pa dag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:7a-15: de'i sngags bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:7a-16: na ma: sa manta badzr'a n'am; tra ta /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:7a-17: aa mo gha tsanda ma h'a ro sha na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:7a-19: tra ma ya tra ma ya h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:7a-20: tra ta h'am mam zhes brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:7a-32: sha za la sogs pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:7a-34: mkhris pa las gyur pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:7a-35: bad kan las gyur pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:7b-0: rtag pa'i rims @7b las thar par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:7b-9: bung ba'i gnod pa las thar ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:7b-11: dmag dpung gi 'jigs pa las thar ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:7b-14: bza' mi 'thab cing rtsod pa las thar ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:7b-18: lce 'bab pas 'jigs pa las thar ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:7b-26: mtshon cha'i 'jigs pa las thar ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:7b-27: 'chi ba dang dus ma yin par 'chi ba las thar ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:7b-28: mchams med pa lnga la sogs pa'i sdig pa kun dag par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:7b-33: dbang po ma tshang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:7b-35: log par lta bar 'dzin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:7b-36: sangs rgyas 'byung ba las mnyes pa med pa dag tu mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:7b-38: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:7b-39: lan gcig brjod pas kyang sdig pa thams cad 'dag par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:7b-40: 'di brjod pa'i gang zag des ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:8a-0: chos nyid kyi lam rdo rje lta bu @8a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:8a-1: myur ba nyid du thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:8a-2: de nas rta bdun pa'i steng du rnam par dag pa'i yi ge nam mkha' ma lus pa 'od kyis 'gengs pa bsams te byams pa'i lta bas lta ba'i phyir ham ser po mig tu'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:8a-4: mam nag po bsam par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:8a-5: spyi bor chos nyid rnam par dag pa'i yi ge bsams te sngags 'di brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:8a-6: na ma: sa manta badzr'a p'a ni tsanda ma h'a ro sha na h'um zhes brjod de lag pa thal mo sbyar te gung mo bsgrengs pa'i rgyab tu mdzub mo cung zad bkug pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:8a-7: srin lag kyang de bzhin bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:8a-9: 'di'i byin gyi rlabs kyis ma rig pa 'joms shing ye shes kyi sku nyid du byin gyis brlabs pa'o; ;gser la sogs pa'i snod du kha zas kyi bye brag nas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:8a-22: byi ru dag blugs te 'bru gsum pa'i sngags kyi byin gyis brlabs nas sngags 'di brjod par bya'o; ;na ma: sa manta ta th'a ga te bhyo: bi shva mu khe bhya:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:8a-23: sarba th'a kham aud ga te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:8a-24: spha ra na ai mam ga ga na kham zhes brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:8b-0: @8b na ma: sarba ta th'a ga ta aa ba lo ki te aom sam bha ra h'um zhes bya bas 'byung po kun la mchod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:8b-1: de nas gsang sngags 'di brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:8b-2: na ma: sa manta buddha n'am tsanda ma h'a ro sha na aa sa me tri sa me ma h'a sa ma ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:8b-4: phyag rgya thal mo sbyar la gsol ba gdab ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:8b-6: 'phags pa mi g-yo ba'i gzungs las; le'u gnyis pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:8b-15: gang nas brtsams te khyad par gyis mchod cing nam du yang mi 'bral bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:8b-16: tshad med pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi rgyud rtag tu bsgom zhing smon lam rgya chen por gdab par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:8b-20: phyag rgya'i rten rgyun du bcang zhing bral bar mi bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:8b-23: byang chub kyi grogs la khong nas 'khrug pa'i sems spang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:8b-24: srog gis bsdus pa'i sems can thams cad la byams pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:8b-25: snying rje sngon du song bas gnod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:8b-26: rnam par 'tshe ba spangs te nam yang dor bar mi bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:8b-27: ser sna spangs te sems can la sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:8b-28: sems can la gnod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:9a-2: rang la rnam par 'tshe ba la bzod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:9a-3: rang dang gzhan gyi don sgrub pa la brtson pa dor bar mi bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:9a-4: rnam par g-yeng ba spangs te bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhag go //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:9a-5: nyal ba dang ldang ba kun tu rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i don la ma g-yeng bar bya'o /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:9a-6: dam tshig med cing mi gnas pa la bsam gtan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:9a-9: phyag rgya la sogs pa kun bsten cing bshad par mi bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:9a-11: ma byin par len pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:9a-12: 'dod pa la phyin ci log pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:9a-15: spyad par 'dod pas spang par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:9a-17: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:9a-18: dam tshig dang ldan pa gus par bya zhing brnyas par mi bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:9a-19: thun mtshams kyi sbyor ba dang ldan par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:9a-20: khro ba dang bab col du smra ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:9a-25: sen mo la sogs pa'i mi gtsang ba de dag dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:9a-27: dri mi zhim pa bku zhing mnam pa dang ldan pa thams cad spang bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:9b-0: spos kyi khang pa yid du 'ong ba gtsang zhing dri ma med pa dag bkra shis pa'i @9b sgo shar du bstan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:9b-1: gseng skar dang bcas pa'i khang pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:9b-3: dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:9b-9: spang ljongs dag tu dri zhim po'i chus skyang nul byas la rtsva'i stan bting ste gnas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:9b-10: khri la 'dug pa spang bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:9b-19: 'bras zan la sogs pa dag smyung ba dang ldan pas bza' bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:9b-22: sgog pa la sogs pa dku ba'i zas rnams kun tu spang bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:9b-25: tshes grangs la sogs pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:9b-26: yar gyi ngo dag la dkon mchog la gsol ba btab pa bsgrub par bya'o /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:9b-31: 'dod pa'i don du 'jam zhing gnag pa la ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:9b-33: dus rtag tu yi dam la dang ba bskyed pa'i phyir byams pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pas bsgrub par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:9b-34: sprul pa'i khro bo rdo rje shugs can ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:9b-35: kha dog shin tu nag pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:9b-36: nga dang nga yir 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid gnam lcags kyi 'khor lo bsnams pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:10a-1: dmar po chags pa dang chags par byed pa'i bzhin gyi mda' gzhu'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:10a-4: 'dzin cing yongs su 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid lcags kyu 'dzin pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:10a-7: mi shes pa dang mi shes pa 'joms pa'i bdag nyid rdo rje'i grags 'dzin pa'o /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:10a-10: khro ba dang khro bo'i bdag nyid kyi ral gri 'bar ba bsnams pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:10a-13: btang snyoms dang btang snyoms su gyur pa'i bdag nyid kyi sprin gyi zhags pa 'dzin pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:10a-15: du ba'i mdog can bya ba dang byed pa'i bdag nyid kyi rdo rje bsnams pa'o; ;rdo rje stobs chen po ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:10a-17: dman pa dang dman pa'i rang bzhin can gyi gnam lags kyi 'khor lo 'dzin pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:10a-20: rten 'brel dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i bdag nyid kyi be con 'dzin pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:10a-22: sna tshogs 'phrin las mdog can mtha' dang mtha' las grol ba'i bdag nyid can gyi rdo rje rtse gcig pa bsnams pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:10a-24: sa bcu'i bdag nyid can me 'bar ba'i sku las rab tu 'phro ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:10b-0: 'phags @10b pa mi g-yo ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:10b-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la thun mong du de dag pa'i phyir de'i cho ga gsungs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:10b-3: gnas khang yid du 'ong bar dri zhim po dang ldan pa'i sa la mandal mda' gang ba byas te ba'i rnam lnga'i skyang nul byas la me tog sngon po dgram par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:10b-4: de nas bum pa gser ram /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:10b-6: zangs las byas pa'i lhung bzed kyi ched du byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:10b-7: der rin po che gser dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:10b-11: mu tig dang rnam par lnga gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:10b-23: cu rtse rnams gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:10b-29: li shi rnams gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:10b-35: ga bur la sogs pa'i dri rnams kyang gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:10b-40: lu ma bkod pa rnams kyi chu yang blugs la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:10b-41: ba bla'am ras la dri'i chus bsang bas mgul pa bcings te gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:11a-2: 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i shing la kha rgyan byas te dri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:11a-8: rol mo'i sgra dag kyang bsham par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:11a-9: 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma yang cha bdun nam lnga la sogs pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:11a-10: na ma: sa manta badzra n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:11a-11: aa tsa la tsanda ma h'a ro sha na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:11a-13: badzra dhri ka khadga h'um zhes bya bas mtshams rnams bcing bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:11a-14: de bzhin du srung ba'i cho ga rdzogs par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:11a-15: bum pa la gzungs kyi thag pa btags nas rnam par dag pa'i ye shes yongs su bsgyur ba'i bum pa la bhrum zhes bya ba'i sa bon las kha dog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:11a-16: tshad dang ldan pa'i bum pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:11a-17: thugs kyi sa bon las byung ba'i bcom ldan 'das don de kho na nyid las mnyam par bzhugs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:11a-20: 'phags pa'i gang zag dang bcas pa gdan sengge'i steng na sna tshogs pa'i gdan padma dang zla ba'i steng na bzhugs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:11a-21: chos nyid dang ldan pa'i rnam pa drug gis bcom ldan 'das bsam par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:11b-0: gzugs @11b brnyan dang bcas pa'i skur nyi ma'i gdan padma dang tshogs kyi bdag po glang sna'i steng du bsam ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:11b-1: thugs kyi sa bon las ral gri me 'od dang bcas pas nam mkha' kun tu khebs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:11b-2: de las bdud tshar gcod pa'i bcom ldan 'das kyi skur bsams te mchod pas bcom ldan 'das la mchod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:11b-3: na ma: sa manta buddh'a n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:11b-4: aom a'a: h'um; pra ba ra sata ka ra pra t'i tstsha h'um zhes brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:11b-5: na ma: sa manta buddha n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:11b-7: sarba de ba t'a aa tsi na tya aa mri ta dha r'a ya sv'a h'a zhes brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:11b-8: na ma: sa manta buddha n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:11b-9: aom ha ra bha ga wa na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:11b-10: sarba bidya dha ra p'u dzi te sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:11b-12: na ma: sa manta buddha n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:11b-14: dharma dha tu aa nu ga te dh'um pe h'um sv'a h'a zhes brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:11b-15: na ma: sa manta buddha n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:11b-17: ma h'a mee tri bhyo ga te pushpe h'um zhes brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:11b-18: na ma: sa manta buddha n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:11b-20: sarba th'a ga ta aa tsi pra na aa bh'a ba ga ga na bhya ni rya a'a lo ke h'um sv'a h'a zhes brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:11b-21: na ma: sa manta buddha n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:11b-23: ga ga na sa ma ya gandhe h'um sv'a h'a zhes brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:11b-24: na ma: sa manta buddha n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:11b-25: a'a h'a ra sarba ta th'a ga te nee wi dyee p'u dza na spha ra na ye h'um sv'a h'a zhes brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:11b-26: na ma: sa manta buddha n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:11b-28: spha ra na ai mam ga ga na kham/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:12a-2: sarba ta th'a ga ta pa ri shuddha manta le ma ma pra ni dhi p'u dza na ma be len dharma dha tu /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:12a-3: aa dhishtha na pa tsa h'um sv'a h'a zhes brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:12a-4: rdo rje dang dril bu gsil bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:12a-5: thal mo bkan la mdzub mo gnyis gung mo'i rgyab tu cung zhig bkug pa sbyar /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:12a-6: srin lag dang mthe'u chung bsnol la mthe bong cung zhig bkug pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:12a-8: sor mo rnams gung mo la brten te cung zad bkug la gung mo bsgreng ba ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:12a-10: sor mo rnams phan tshun bsnol te nang du bcug nas mdzub mo mthe bos mnan pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:12a-12: mthe bong dang gung mo'i sor mo rtse sprad de lhag ma khu tshur bcangs pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:12a-14: mi 'jigs pa'i phyag rgya lag pa g-yon pas mkhrig ma bteg pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:12a-16: thal mo bkan pa'i zur sbyar te mthe'u chung gnyis gshibs nas bsgreng ba ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:12a-18: spyi bor lag pa bskor te thal mo khong stong sbyar nas dkrol ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:12a-19: rgya chen po'i mchod pa ste; mchod pa'i rdzas rnams rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i lha mos rdzas sbyangs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:12a-20: na ma: sa manta buddha n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:12a-21: aa bh'a ba sva bh'a ba mud ga t'a n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:12b-0: n'a ma pra tye ka buddha a'arya @12b shra ba ka n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:12b-1: na mo bo dhi satva n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:12b-2: da sha bh'u mi pra tishthi te sha ra n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:12b-6: aom kha kha kh'a hi kh'a hi dushta sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:12b-7: k'a ma kra aa si mu sa la pa ra shu p'a sha ha sta ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:12b-12: sarba bighhnam gh'a ga bi kri t'i n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:12b-13: sarba bhu ta bha yam ka ra aatta h'a sa ni ri te by'a ghra tsarma ni ba sa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:12b-14: ku ru ku ru sarba dharm'a n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:12b-18: a'a karsha ya a'a karsha ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:12b-22: pra be sha ya pra be sha ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:12b-23: mandal ma dhye bhye ba sa tya dz'i bi ti na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:12b-24: ka ra ka ra ku ru ku ru ma ma sarba k'aryam/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:12b-29: aa nu sma ra h'um h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:12b-32: sarba sha ta pa ri p'u ra ka /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:12b-34: kinytsi r'a ya si; ma ma sarba rtham sarba s'a dha ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:12b-37: tsanda ma h'a ro sha n'a spho ta ya h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:12b-38: tra ma tra ma h'am mam zhes pa bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:12b-39: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal bar dmigs la las dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:12b-44: nad la sogs pa zhi bar dmigs te bzla bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:12b-45: de nas gtong bar 'dod pas zlos pa'i tshe gdams pa'i tshul gyis dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:13a-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ras ris kyi cho ga gsungs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:13a-4: shing bal shin tu dri ma med pa la bram ze'am gtsang sbra dang ldan pa'i khrus byas te dkon mchog gsum la gsol ba btab la brtag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:13a-5: rigs ngan dmangs rigs la sogs pa'i ras dag ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:13a-9: aa ga ru la sogs pa'i chus bkrus te dag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:13a-10: de nas sngags 'di gro ga'am ras la bris nas gdags par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:13a-23: sha sha sa ha: ksha: zhes bya ba bris te dgod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:13a-24: de nas sngags 'di lan bdun brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:13a-25: na ma: sa manta buddha n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:13a-29: aom w'a kye dam na ma: zhes bya ba las thams cad 'grub pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:13a-32: gla rtsi'i chu la bsngags shing gtor bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:13a-33: de nas ri mo mkhan khrus dag par byas te bram ze'i rigs kyis bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:13b-1: lcags rang gis bri bar bya ba'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:13b-11: de la sogs pa'i mtshon rnams la aa ga ru dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:13b-15: rgya spos la sogs pa rnams dang sbyar la sngags 'di lan bdun brjod de bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:13b-16: na ma: sa manta buddh'a n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:13b-17: tsanda ma h'a ro sha na spho ta ya h'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:13b-21: khe tsa ra mam zhes brjod la bri bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:13b-22: khyad par bzang po 'dzoms pa'i dus su tshul khrims dang ldan zhing dag pa la kha zas byin te spyan dbye bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:13b-23: bri ba yang de bzhin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:13b-24: spyan 'byed pa'i dus su sngags 'di brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:13b-25: na ma: sa manta buddh'a n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:13b-26: tsanda ma h'a ro sha na spho ta ya h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:13b-28: ga ga na ba ra la ksha na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:13b-30: sarba ta th'a ga ta tsakshu: aom a'a: h'um sv'a h'a zhes sbrang rtsi gser gyi thur ma la byugs la lan gsum du byug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:13b-31: bris sku tshad dang ldan pa yongs su zin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:13b-32: 'bri mkhan la ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du sbyin par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:14a-0: rdo ba dag las byed na yang de bzhin du @14a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:14a-1: bya'o; ;gzugs dang sku'i khyad par gyi rang bzhin dang rang bzhin ma yin pas khyad par tha dad pa dag tu bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:14a-3: ldan pa la bar chad zhi bar bya ba'i phyir gzugs sku las ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:14a-4: yongs su bsgyur nas byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:14a-5: de nas khyad par bzang po'i dus su khang pa ba'i rnam lngas byugs par byas te ras ris dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:14a-8: glegs bam la sogs pa mandal gyi steng du bzhugs su gsol te /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:19a-48: na ma: sa manta buddh'a n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:19a-49: tsanda ma h'a ro sha na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:19a-51: spho ta ya spho ta ya h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:19a-52: aa sa manti ka tra ta /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:19a-54: sha ta p'a ra mantram; aam aam h'um ham/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:19a-55: shuddha tree lo kya tu shyem tu badzra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:19a-56: aa pra ta ha te bi li bhya: na mo dza la ya tra ta /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:19b-0: aatta ha sa na mam h'am sv'a h'a zhes gsungs ma thag tu 'dzam bu gling na @19b gnas pa'i lha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:19b-6: lto 'phye la sogs pa thams cad sreg cing sa la 'gyel bar gyur to; ;de nas cho ga gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:19b-7: lcags sna lnga las byas pa'i ral gri khru tshad gsum pa byas te sngags kyi phreng ba mam ham zhes bya ba bkod la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:19b-8: khru do dang ldan pa'i spos kyi mandal byas te mchod pa'i rdzas dang ldan pa'i dri bzhag ste gzungs sngags 'di khri phrag tu brjod cing bzlas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:19b-9: ral gri nam mkha' la 'phags par 'gyur ro; ;de nas g-yul du zhugs na dpag bsam gyi shing yang dum bu dum bur gcod par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:19b-10: g-yul las rgyal bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:19b-11: lcags sna lnga las byas pa'i lhung bzed byas te mam ham zhes bya ba'i yi ge bkod de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:19b-14: zangs las byas pa'i bum par gdugs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:19b-20: dung g-yas su 'khyil ba rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:19b-22: yang na zangs la byi ru bcug par byas la gzungs sngags 'di gro ga'am ras la bris te khong pa'am mgul du btags nas gzungs sngags bye ba bzlas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:19b-23: lhung bzed nam mkha' la 'phags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:20a-1: btab na 'dod pa'i yon tan ci 'dod pa 'byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:20a-3: nam mkha'i tri ta'i lce dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:20a-4: 'ug pa'i mig dang gnyis cha mnyam pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:20a-5: lcags sna gsum gyi phye ma la khva ta'i khrag gis ril bu bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig byas te thod pa dum bu gcig par bcug la gzungs sngags ham mam zhes byas pas padma la bskor te gzungs sngags bye ba bzlas na padma nam mkha' la 'phags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:20a-6: de mi dbugs dang bral ma thag tu snying gi khrag rlangs dang sbyar te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:20a-7: mig ni snang byed du bsam zhing ral gri'i phyag rgyas mig dang rna ba la bskus na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:20a-8: thams cad mthong zhing thos la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:20a-9: khar bcug na rang nyid sus kyang mi mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:20a-10: na ma: sa manta buddh'a n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:20a-11: sarba ta th'a ga ta bya ba lo ki te dza ya dza ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:20a-12: b'a kye dam na wa ni tsakshu ra bi sho dha ya sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:20a-13: rnga lpags la bya rgod kyi tshil bu byugs nas mnyes te lham byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:20a-14: ham dang mam rang gi rkang mthil la phris te gzungs sngags bye ba bzlas na lham nam mkha' la 'phags te rkang pa la bya rgod kyi tshil bu byugs nas go na na gar 'dod par phyin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:20a-15: na ma: sa manta buddh'a n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:20a-16: aom brum ma h'a ye gri ta sv'a h'a zhes bya bas nam mkha' la 'gro zhing 'phags te bya rgod bzhin du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:20b-0: skye ba bdun @20b ba'i sha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:20b-3: sbrang rtsi rnams sbyar la lde gu byas te gzungs sngags bye ba brjod de lus la byugs nas ram nye ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:20b-5: bra ma ka ra'i mar dang sbyar ba'i lde gu rnams nang re la srang re cha sbrang rtsi dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:20b-6: ba ser skya'i 'o ma rnams btang ste zla ba gcig tu bsgrubs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:20b-7: nam mkha' la thogs pa med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:20b-8: rta nag po mig gnyis dkar po 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:20b-9: byi ba nag po rna ba gnyis dkar po'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:20b-10: pha bang dkar po rnams mi mngal nas skra dkar po'i srog chags la rma bya'i chu kham phor du blugs pa la gzungs sngags bye ba bzlas te blud la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:20b-11: de'i mig gnyis ma nor bar bton pa grib ma la bskams nas ma rul pa'i phye ma la sngags 'di btab te g-yas g-yon ma nor bar byugs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:20b-13: 'phags pa'i spyan dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:20b-22: rtug pa rnams la ril bu byas te kham pa'i ga'ur ril bu re re la gzungs sngags ham mam zhes bya ba brjod de ga'u nam mkha' la 'phags nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:20b-23: na ma: sa manta buddh'a n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:21a-0: na ma; yam na ma h'a ri bi ni natti hr'i: zhes lan bdun btab nas @21a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:21a-1: byin na; gang 'dong pa de dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:21a-8: de rnams kyi mche ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:21a-10: bram ze'i rus pa'i thal ba la gzungs sngags bzlas te sgrub pa byas nas dus ma yin pa'i sprin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:21a-11: ser ba dag la gtor na sprin rnams 'thor zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:21a-14: thog la sogs pa zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:21a-20: gu gul dang sbyar te dud pas bdugs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:21a-22: 'phags pa mi g-yo ba'i gzungs las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:21a-24: aom tsanda ma h'a ro sha na h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:21a-27: lan gcig brjod pas kyang 'dzam bu'i gling gi lha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:21a-29: gnod sbyin la sogs pa kun zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:21a-35: yud tsam pa las thar ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:21a-40: g-yan pa dag zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:21b-0: @21b lan gcig brjod pas kyang mtshams med pa la sogs pa'i sdig pa zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:21b-1: rig byed tshig gi dang po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:21b-2: gnyis pa'i dang por bcas pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:21b-3: gsum pa dag ni lnga par ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:21b-4: bzhi pa yi ni bzhi pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:21b-5: lnga pa dag gi lnga pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:21b-6: aushma'i rnams kyi bzhi pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:21b-7: mthar gnas pa yi gnyis pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:21b-8: ao yis mtshan pa bri bya ste; ;aushma rnams kyi gnyis pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:21b-9: bzhi pa'i yi ge lnga pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:21b-10: aushma'i yi ge bzhi pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:21b-11: au yis brgyan cing thig ler bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:21b-12: sde tshan lnga pa dag gi ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:21b-13: dang po'i yi ge spangs pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:21b-14: bzhi pa dang por bcas pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:21b-15: snying po'i yi ge bcu pa dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:21b-16: 'khor lo rtsibs bcu pa bsgrub bya'i ming dang bcas pa bris te khyi nag po'i thod pa'i nang du bcug la gzungs sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te nyungs kar gyis brab par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:21b-17: de nas klu yod pa'i gnas su khyer la rang gi lus la gla rtsis byugs te chu mig tu thod pa bcug la gzungs sngags 'di brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:21b-18: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:21b-19: na ma: shtsanda ma h'a ro sha na h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:21b-20: na mo bha ga te buddha b'a r'i ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:21b-27: sor mo rnams brkyang ste mthe'u chung bkug la mthe bos mnan te bskor bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:22a-1: ya; na mashtsanda badzra kro dha ha ya gri ba na mi mi li tsi li dhom//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:22a-7: pra dzva la pra dzva la; sphu ta sphu ta /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:22a-9: n'a ga na si ra sa ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:22a-10: bi sa ra sarba du sht'am hri da ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:22a-11: sho sha na h'um h'um phat phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:22a-13: lag pa'i zur gnyis gshibs te srin lag gnyis rgyab tu bsnol la mdzub mo gnyis kyis mnan nas mthe'u chung gnyis gshibs bsgreng la gung mo dang mthe bong gnyis gshibs te spyi bor bzhag nas sngags lan bdun brjod de ldang bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:22a-20: shu dag rnams sbyar te lus la byugs na rdzas kyis srung ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:22a-21: rgya sol gyi me la bsregs te bdugs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:22a-23: dus ma yin pa'i rlung rnams zhi bar 'gyur zhing gdon rnams 'bros par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:22a-33: rgya mtsho'i lbu ba la sogs pa dag 'khar gzhong du blugs te yungs kar la gzungs sngags 'di brjod cing klu mchod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:22a-34: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:22b-0: na ma @22b shtsanda badzra kro dh'a h'um h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:22b-7: aom ga ta pa la wa ta /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:22b-8: karko ta phu sv'ah'a zhes brjod pas klu rnams bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:22b-10: dri zhim po'i chus mandal byas te spra tshil la klu'i gzugs sor mo nyi shu rtsa lnga pa byas nas mandal gyi steng du me tog gtor la gzungs thag btags te gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:22b-11: snying gar gong gi de gro ga la gi'u wang gis bris la bzhugs par byas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:22b-12: nyin mtshan du mchod cing bal po se'u'i lcug mas khyab par byas nas gzungs 'di brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:22b-13: aom sum su pra ti badzra dunte mi li mi li ba ri sha ya sv'ah'a zhes brjod de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:22b-14: rang smyung bar gnas par bya'o; ;gal te klu rnams kyis char mi 'bebs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:22b-15: klu rnams kyi mgo aardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du 'gas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:22b-16: spos kyi mandal byas te rgya spos kyi me la gzugs bsro zhing gzungs sngags brjod pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:22b-18: dri zhim po'i me la bu ram dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:22b-21: til la sogs pa'i dgang blugs kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:22b-22: aom tsanda ma h'a ro sha na h'um sh'antim ku ru sv'ah'a zhes bya bas mchod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:22b-23: 'phags pa mi g-yo ba'i gzungs las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:23a-1: de nas 'dam skyes padma sna tshogs pa'i 'dab ma can gyi steng du aa las byung ba'i chu'i dkyil 'khor; de'i steng du mu gyi sa bon las byung ba'i shes rab kyi mtshan ma mum dang ldan pa las 'phags pa 'jam dpal mgon po'i sku byis pa lo brgyad gnyis lon pa lta bu /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:23a-2: gser btso ma' ma gur gum gyi kha dog 'dra ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:23a-4: sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzzhugs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:23a-5: phyag g-yas pa na ral gri nam mkha' la 'phyar ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:23a-6: g-yon pas po ti thugs kar 'dzin pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:23a-7: shar gyi padma'i 'dab ma la 'jam dpal dpa' bo sku mdog kha ba la gur gum gyis gtor ba 'dra ba'i zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:23a-8: sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:23a-9: phyag g-yas pa na ral gri nam mkha' la 'phyar ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:23a-10: g-yon pa na autpa la'i sdong bu dang bcas pa thugs ka na 'dzin pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:23a-11: lho'i padma'i 'dab ma la 'jam dpal gsung gi dbang phyug sku mdog mthing zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:23a-12: sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:23a-13: phyag g-yas pa na ral gri nam mkha' la 'phyar ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:23a-14: g-yon pa na 'khor lo thugs ka na 'dzin pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:23b-0: nub @23b kyi padma'i 'dab ma la 'jam dpal rnon po sku mdog byi ru bcag pa lta bu /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:23b-2: sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:23b-3: phyag gnyis na autpal [?] gnyis bsnams pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:23b-4: byang gi padma'i 'dab ma la 'jam dpal shes rab ral gri sku mdog ljang gu /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:23b-6: sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa; phyag g-yas kyi dang po na ral gri nam mkha' la 'phyar ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:23b-7: g-yon gyi dang po na autpa la sdong bu dang bcas pa thugs kar 'dzin pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:23b-8: g-yas kyi 'og ma na mnga' 'dzin pa; g-yon gyi 'og ma na rin po che'i gzhu 'dzin pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:23b-10: ma rig pa'i mun pa thams cad bsal ba'i nam mkha' ma lus pa'i 'od kyis 'gengs pa'i sku'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:23b-11: aom dharma dh'a tu w'a gi shva ri mum zhes brjod pas shes rab ldan zhing thos pa 'dzin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:23b-13: rin po che'i bum pa cu gang dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:23b-17: gla rtsi la sogs pa dri zhim po'i chu blugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:23b-18: na ma: sa manta ta th'a ga te bhya:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:23b-22: aom ku m'a ra bh'u t'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:23b-23: dh'a ra ni; bi shva sam bha ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:23b-24: aa gtstsha ya aa gatstsha ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:23b-27: h'um h'um dzi na dzi ka /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:23b-31: sarba du: khe bhya: phat phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:24a-0: aa mri tod bha ba sa @24a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:24a-3: sarba p'a pam me n'a sha ya sv'ah'a zhes gzungs sngags 'di bum pa'i chu la lan bdun brjod de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:24a-5: sdig pa thams cad 'dag par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:24a-6: dbang po rno zhing thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:24a-7: na ma: sarba tha th'a ga t'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:24a-23: a'a bi sha ya a'a bi sha ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:24a-26: sphu ta sa sphu ta sa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:24a-28: na ma: sam bo dha ni pra bi sha ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:24a-29: loo hu ta loo hu ta /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:24a-32: a'a be sha ya a'a be sha ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:24a-33: ham mam sarba bighnam h'um h'um phat phat sv'ah'a zhes bya bas nad pa la 'bras kyi snye ma'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:24a-34: til la btab ste khrus bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:24a-35: gzungs bzlas pa'i khrus byas pas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:24a-38: rnam par smin pa'i sdug bsngal las thar par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:24a-39: ka ra'i shing gi me la sbyin sreg byas na yang zhi bar 'gyur ro; ;ral gri la btab nas g-yul du zhugs na g-yul las rgyal bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:24b-0: smyung ba dang ldan pas sku gzugs kyi mdun du bsgrub par bya zhing 'phags pa @24b la gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:24b-1: gro ga'am ras la bris te sdug bsngal gyis nyen pa la gdags par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:24b-2: skud pa la gzungs sngags btab ste mdud pa byas la srid kyis gdungs pa la btags te 'phags pa la gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:24b-4: bu mo dag smyung bas 'dug ste yi dam du 'don na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:24b-9: sha za la sogs pa'i gnod pa mi 'byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:24b-13: dus ma yin pa'i 'chi ba dag las grol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:24b-16: dred la sogs pa'i dud 'gro dag gi gnod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:24b-19: dus ma yin pa'i sa g-yo ba rnams zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:24b-20: yid gzhungs shing thos pa 'dzin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:24b-21: nyon mongs pa'i bag chags spong ba la gzhol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:24b-22: 'phags pa'i sku thams cad thogs pa med pa'i spyan gyis mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:24b-24: rigs kyi bu mo dag gis 'di lan gcig gam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:24b-28: brgya rtsa brgyad du rjod par byed na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:24b-34: lkog ma'i lha gor na ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:25a-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal 'dzum pa mdzad de rnam par thar pa'i sgo kun nas 'jug pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag ste sems can dmyal ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:25a-6: gling bzhi'i mi'i 'jig rten du 'od kyis khyab par mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:25a-7: de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:25a-12: gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa'i gnas man chad khyab par mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:25a-13: bsam gtan dang po'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:25a-14: bsam gtan dang po nas langs te bsam gtan gnyis pa la mnyam par bzhag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:25a-15: gnyis pa las langs te bsam gtan gsum pa la mnyam par bzhag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:25a-16: gsum pa las langs nas bsam gtan bzhi pa la mnyam par bzhag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:25a-17: bsam gtan bzhi pa las langs nas nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la mnyam par bzhag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:25a-18: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las langs nas rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la mnyam par bzhag go //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:25b-0: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las langs nas @25b ci yang med pa'i skye mched la mnyam par bzhag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:25b-1: ci yang med pa'i skye mched las langs nas yod min med min skye mched la mnyam par bzhag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:25b-2: de las langs nas de bzhin nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:25b-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:25b-5: sgrib pa rnam par sel ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:25b-7: spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:25b-9: byams pa la sogs pa rnams mngon par dga'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:25b-15: dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:25b-16: 'phags pa mi g-yo ba'i gzungs las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:25b-18: 'phags pa mi g-yo ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:25b-19: rgya gar gyi mkhan po dharma shr'i mi tra dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-001:25b-20: bod kyi lo ts'a ba dge slong chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus ste gtan la phab pa /
